text:
Are you looking for?
“Fastest delivery + Quality Code + Amazing Animation Skill + Blazing Fast Website”

Hello.
This is Shuvo. I’m a senior full stack web developer for 5+ years of experiences. Passionate about pushing the tech industry and new idea forward by working with my skills and experience. I always love to learn new cutting edge technologies and overcome challenges. Available 40 hours per week, fully remote in several time zones.

Linkedin: <https://www.linkedin.com/in/sar333/>
Github: <https://github.com/neutral-Stage>
Personal Website: <http://shuvoanirbanroy.com/>

:heart_on_fire: Special Expert
- Any popular headless CMS such as Sanity, Strapi, Prismic, GraphCMS
- Specialised in Shopify Custom Storefront using (Nuxt/Vue/ React/ Gatsby/ Next Js)
- Any Custom Map( Google Map/ Mapbox)
- School/College/ Hotel Management System
- Solving Complex Problem
- Chat Application
- Mobile App
- SMS api backend using Twilio
- Awesome Animation (Framer Motion, GSAP, Anime, Three Js)
- Full Dynamic Responsive Website with SEO
- create any browser extension supported in Chrome and Firefox
- webRTC and livekit client and server setup

:construction: Backend-Development
- Server-Side: PHP/Laravel, Node.js/ Express.js
- Database: MySQL, MongoDB, Firebase
- Headless CMS: <http://Sanity.io|Sanity.io>, Strapi


:desert: Front - end development
- Vue.js/ React.js
- Vuetify/ Bootstrap/ Tailwind CSS
- CSS3/SASS/SCSS/LESS
-Javascript/ ES6 / JQuery
- Gatsby / Nuxt / Next Js

:iphone: Mobile Development: React Native(Android & iOS)

Do not hesitate to send me a private message directly or by email : <mailto:anirbanroy691@gmail.com|anirbanroy691@gmail.com>
Ready to start work immediately!
